text.section: The powers and duties of the Chesapeake Bay Trust shall rest in and be exercised by a board of 19 trustees.

The Board of Trustees shall consist of:
The President of the Senate, ex officio;
The Speaker of the House, ex officio;
The Secretaries of Agriculture, the Environment, and Natural Resources, ex officio, or their designees; and
14 individuals appointed by the Governor as follows:
8 shall represent the interests of local government, education, environmental conservation, and the general public; and
6 shall represent the business community.
The Governor shall consider geographical balance in making appointments to the Board of Trustees.
